post.author: Admin
post.title: Concert Uniform Pick-Up
post.description:
The dates for Concert Uniform Pick-Up are:
Tuesday, December 2nd, 6:00pm - 8:00pm Wedn
post.content:
The dates for Concert Uniform Pick-Up are:

  • Tuesday, December 2nd, 6:00pm - 8:00pm
  • Wednesday, December 3rd, 6:00pm - 8:00pm

Pick-up location is in the OLD UNIFORM ROOM, where you picked up your marching uniform (upstairs over cafeteria 2). All pieces of your marching uniform must be returned before you can pick up your concert uniform.

Boys who need a tux shirt (mainly freshman) will be able to order them from Tuxedo Junction. There will be someone available both evenings to measure you and take your order. The cost of the shirts is $22.50. Shirts can also be ordered at Tuxedo Junction located in PatCatan's. Just mention that you are with NRHS.

Girls who are new to Wind Ensemble will need to purchase a pearl necklace and earrings from us. Cost is $10. They will be available for purchase when you pick up your uniform.

Questions? Contact Stacy at 440-263-1855.
